entry.title: Engineer not Developer
entry.content: I have attended a one-week training about TDD, one of the most impressed thing is everytime when we said developer the trainer would correct it with engineer.
entry.summary: I have attended a one-week training about TDD, one of the most impressed thing is everytime when we said developer the trainer would correct it with engineer.

entry.title: A hand to the old ones
entry.content: When I was in a daze outside the small garden on the fifth floor at noon, I met an auntie cleaning and asked me a question about mobile payment, to the effect that someone helped her to operate a mobile phone with a nucleic acid test number, but she doesn’t sure about the hospital name and want to verify it. She can’t even figure out what app she used to place the order and only know that the final payment was made by WeChat, but the details of the payer was not displayed in the bill.
entry.summary: When I was in a daze outside the small garden on the fifth floor at noon, I met an auntie cleaning and asked me a question about mobile payment, to the effect that someone helped her to operate a mobile phone with a nucleic acid test number, but she doesn’t sure about the hospital name and want to verify it. She can’t even figure out what app she used to place the order and only know that the final payment was made by WeChat, but the details of the payer was not displayed in the bill.

entry.title: 2021 新年计划
entry.content: 新的一年已经过去了一个月，才想起来写点东西，随意记录一下过去一段日子的，能想起来的，所作所为吧。

entry.title: 育狗指南
entry.content: 霏霏马上要1岁4个月了，在这个有一点莫名其妙的夜晚，我打算记录一些关于养狗的琐碎事务（大概会按照淘宝购物时间线来梳理。

entry.title: 假分数原理
entry.content: 我最近在不同场合发现了一个共通的原理，如果把期望值类比为分母，实际值比做分子。当实际高于期望时会带来更多的正面效应，例如：
